title: Font Help!
content:
Hi, I need help identifying the font below. Your help is greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621111933im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AuroraStarzonNavy3_4233.jpg)
author: fayala70

comments.content:
Could be a custom job, based on...

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/crillee/italic/glyphs.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621111933/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/crillee/italic/glyphs.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/crillee/italic/glyphs.html")
I was afraid of that, thank you so much!
